participant_1.background:
I was rejected by a modeling agency after my audition.
I try to do laundry at least once a week, but it can be hard to find the time.
I drive an old car to get to gigs, but I love my cats.
I enjoy sharing the recipes I've collected from my mother and daughters with others.
I enjoy working with my hands and making beautiful jewelry.

participant_2.background:
I am not tall, but my brother is.
I used to be a farmer, but I had to give up the farm to pursue my passion for teaching.
i was adopted.
my name is nick.
I used to go to the library a lot more often, but now I prefer to read books on my Kindle.

content.text: Hello, my name is Sarah and I love to make jewelry.
Hi Sarah, nice to meet you! My name is Nick. I love to read books.
Oh what type of books do you like to read?
I like to read all sorts of books. Non-fiction, fiction, romance, history, you name it!
That is great, I love to read non-fiction and historical fiction.
Oh me too! I love learning new things.
Same here! I also enjoy learning about different cultures and people.
Me too! That's why I love reading so much. It's like traveling the world without ever leaving your house.
Exactly! I also love the way books can transport you to another world.
I'm glad you like reading too!
Me too! It's a great way to relax and escape from the real world.
I agree! I love reading before bed.
Me too! It helps me fall asleep.
It's nice to meet you, Nick.
It's nice to meet you too, Sarah.
